${ModID}:BuggyBash.NAME: Buggy Bash
${ModID}:BuggyBash.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals !M! additional damage for each [bugIcon] .

${ModID}:SwarmSword.NAME: Swarm Strike
${ModID}:SwarmSword.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Draw 1 card for each [bugIcon] .

${ModID}:GrassHop.NAME: Locusts
${ModID}:GrassHop.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL When this 获得s [bugIcon] , ALL enemies lose !M! 生命.

${ModID}:Bzzzzz.NAME: Bzzzzzz
${ModID}:Bzzzzz.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL 抽 !M! 张牌。

${ModID}:BugOut.NAME: Bug Out
${ModID}:BugOut.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 获得 1 力量 and Dexterity for each [bugIcon] .

${ModID}:ScarabShield.NAME: Scarab Shield
${ModID}:ScarabShield.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 1 Artifact for each [bugIcon] .

${ModID}:Entomology.NAME: Entomology
${ModID}:Entomology.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If this has any [bugIcon] , remove it to draw 1 card and 获得 [E] .

${ModID}:Compoundeyes.NAME: Compoundeyes
${ModID}:Compoundeyes.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL When you next play a card, end your turn.

${ModID}:Bees.NAME: BEES!!!
${ModID}:Bees.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害 !M! 次。 NL Deals 1 additional damage for each [bugIcon] .

${ModID}:LordOfTheFlies.NAME: Lord of the Flies
${ModID}:LordOfTheFlies.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 additional card each turn. NL When your cards ${ModID}:Infest, put an additional [bugIcon] on them.
